* Arkness Prime steadied herself, watching Megatron and noting, logging and 
storing away every movement he made for future uses.
Though she was surprised that he had removed his cannon, watching eagerly to 
see what tricks this Deceptacon had up his armor-plates sleeve.
So she observed as his weapon of choice was presented, though impressed her 
little.  Her mind had imaged greater weapons, a mega-blaster perhaps.  
But...a ball and chain?  Though, she knew from small hints from the Matrix 
pulsating inside of her chest that this weapon must NOT be taken lightly.  
No weapon from the Deceptacon leader Megatron must be assumed as weak.
But since he had chosen his weapons, her sword would be her own.  Though, 
not composed of energy it had Matrix ions flowing through it and would give 
the same effect as if she had.
Megatron had began to swing the mace, and so her own move was slow but still 
made. She began to circle him, the sword at the ready and her eyes always on 
his body.
Her systems would alert her on any unusual movements, dinging in on an 
attack.*

" The new has always replaced the old, Megatron. As fate circles and 
repeats."
